constraint.description: Finds package dependencies which are in the wrong direction according to the diagram.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (p1:PlantUml:Package)-[:MAY_DEPEND_ON]->(p2:PlantUml:Package), (p3:Java:Package)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(p4:Java:Package) WHERE p1.fullName = p4.fqn AND p2.fullName = p3.fqn RETURN p3.fqn + " --> " + p4.fqn AS WrongDirection
